snippet: Michelle A. Rhee, the divisive former schools chancellor in Washington a is stepping down as chief executive of StudentsFirst, the advocacy group she founded four years ago.
abstract: Michelle A Rhee, former schools chancellor for Washington, DC, announces she is stepping down as chief executive of StudentsFirst, national education advocacy group she founded in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Michelle A. Rhee, the divisive former schools chancellor in Washington a is stepping down as chief executive of StudentsFirst, the advocacy group she founded four years ago.

headline.main: Ex-Head of Washington Schools Steps Down at Advocacy Group
headline.print_headline: Ex-Head of Washington Schools Steps Down at Advocacy Group
